channel.title: meta on Write​_
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Write​_

item.title: 88x31 buttons
item.description: From what I figure, apparently there was something called Geocities back in the mid-90s to the 2000s. People joined online ‘cities’ and made personal websites. One of the things people would add into their sites were these 88x31 images, which sometimes contained links.

item.title: Anotherrr archive
item.description: Back in 2021, I used to have this website called anotherrr.web.app, made with a Static Site Generator I made myself. Due to the horrible codebase, it has since become adandoned. But I’m still quite fond of the content I wrote for it and wish to give those old posts a new home in this site.

item.title: Why I made a website
item.description: Short answer: why not? The longer answer is me waxing poetic. I’ve made a website long long ago, back in 2021. (In fact, you can still see what remains of it here.

item.title: An update
item.description: Hi. Let’s see, my last post here was back in 28 Jan 2024. It’s been four months! I just finished polishing it up yesterday with some minor design changes. With the publish of this post, I got rid of a lot of cringy unhinged text on the main pages.

item.title: My first post
item.description: I’m just starting out and making this cool new Hugo website as a blog teehee. This is called My First Post because that’s what the Hugo quickstart told me to call it :D.
